scripts.start: lerna run build --scope @opencrvs/commons && lerna run build --scope @opencrvs/components && lerna run --parallel --ignore @opencrvs/dashboards --ignore @opencrvs/mobile-proxy $OTHER_LERNA_FLAGS start
scripts.compose:deps:demo: docker compose -p opencrvs -f docker-compose.deps.yml -f docker-compose.demo-deps.yml up
scripts.compose:deps: docker compose -p opencrvs -f docker-compose.deps.yml -f docker-compose.dev-deps.yml up
scripts.compose:deps:detached: docker compose -p opencrvs -f docker-compose.deps.yml -f docker-compose.dev-deps.yml up -d
scripts.compose:down:deps: docker compose -p opencrvs -f docker-compose.deps.yml -f docker-compose.dev-deps.yml down
scripts.build: lerna run build --stream --concurrency=1 && lerna run build-storybook
scripts.build:image: export VERSION=`git log -1 --pretty=format:%h` && docker build --build-arg VERSION=${VERSION} -t opencrvs-build . && unset VERSION
